reviewText: We had seen the movie many times on TV, but it is my son's favorite and so we bought it for Christmas.  I was happy with the DVD and my son (age 7) was very happy. The Suddenly Brothers DVD is also good and contains four episodes from the first season of Drake and Josh.
I love Drake and Josh!
not the best like Alien but ok
Great
Better this movie is fun and i like it than others one
Drake and Josh is a very good series and the fact they made a movie out of the series was a Great Choice!
Great
Poop

Brings back memories of God Nickelodeon movies and TV shows and is a very nostalgic movie..... The old nickelodeon movies defined me and my friends childhood. I would recommend this movie to any young child of this generation.  These new Nick shows are pointless and boring. So young kids if you wanna know how old cartoons and tv shows were ask ur parents, auntie, uncles, or as 17 year older like me how good and nostalgic cartoons were. Like I said these newer cartoons and movies don't define true comedy, entertainment and nostalgia like tv shows and movies back on the day
its great film but can you ask the other to change some things
Brings back memories of summer days as a young teen again !
